title: Wrenched
description: COMPLETED SERIES TO BE READ IN ORDERIn the small town of Connard, Louisiana, evil hides in plain sight.WHISPERStolen—I was a whisper.Freedom—it came with a price.I was a secret.I don’t even know my full name.Miss Catherine and Boxer changed my life.I've started to trust in humanity.That was until Edge walked into my life.Now I’m screwed.I’ve escaped one Hell’s bastard only to be wrenched back towards another.EDGEI thought I knew it all.Even a killer with no conscience can seek redemption.This mess is gonna get real bad before it gets better.Unfortunately, it's gonna take me time to realize my mistakes.It may have started off as a meet-cute, but it sure escalated to life or death.This is NOT your average love story.If you like an unpredictable series packed with twists and turns, then you should come meet Edge and Whisper, but be warned, this series is dark, gritty, and sexy.With a strong female lead and a fearless male lead who will stop at nothing, this love story—because it is indeed a love story wrapped up in a whole lot of action and suspense—will earn your time waiting for the HEA. Wrenched is only the beginning. There's a whole lot more story around the corner.Contains adult situations which may offend and graphic violence, but it is one hell of a fictional ride. Strap yourself in. For mature aged readers 18 +. This is not a stand-alone series.
author: Emma   James
